definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name of English origin, derived from the name Jane, which itself comes from the Hebrew name Yochanan, meaning 'God is gracious'. It is commonly used in Western countries and carries connotations of gentleness and reliability.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的女性名字，由 Jane 演变而来，而 Jane 又源自希伯来语名字 Yochanan，意为“上帝仁慈”。在西方国家广泛使用，常给人以温柔、可靠的印象。
definitions.example_en: Janice volunteered to organize the charity event and ensured everything ran smoothly.
definitions.example_cn: 珍妮斯主动承担了组织慈善活动的任务，并确保一切顺利进行。
